segments.text: Sandy , can you help me contact these people ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , what do you want me to tell them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I need to confirm the time of their classes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , where can I find their telephone number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are all listed here on this sheet of paper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it their home , office or cell phone numbers ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Unless it ’ s marked differently , it ’ s their home numbers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright . What if I can ’ t get a hold of them by phone ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then , you should e-mail them with the information .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where can I find their e-mail addresses ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They should have then listed on their resumes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And if there aren ’ t any e-mail addresses ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then send them a SMS on their cell phone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . That sounds easy enough . Have you called any of them yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I called the first three people on the list , but they didn ’ t pick up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you leave a voice message ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I left a voice message on one---just for the first person on the list .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . What did you tell her ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I told her that she should call me back at my office number .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , so , maybe I should call her again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that sounds like a good idea . She might not get the other message in time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One more question . It looks like some of these numbers are long-distance . Do you have a calling card that I can use to get through to them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . You can use this one . The pin number is written on the back of the card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright . Thanks a lot . Don ’ t worry . I ’ ll take care of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great work . I ’ m off for the weekend ! See you on Monday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: See you .
segments.speaker: S2
